text: So manga zakat na aya bo a khibagian on na so pkhakamrmran, go so manga miskin, go so manga gomagalbk on; go so playamn so manga poso iran (ko bnar); go so kaaona ko khikaooripn, go so adn a manga bayadan iyan; go so sii ko lalan o Allah, go so gii mlayalayag a miyakawang sa lalan: Paliyogat a phoon ko Allah, na so Allah na Matao, a Mawngangn
